name: meraproduct
description: Chrome extension to detect Made in India products on e-commerce sites

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run create-debug-icons
scripts.build:simple: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run create-placeholder-icons
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src dist/ && cp -r assets dist/ && cp -r _locales dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../meraproduct-v1.0.0.zip .
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.dev: npm run build:simple && npm run fix-icons && echo 'Load unpacked extension from ./dist directory'
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --watch assets --watch _locales --watch manifest.json --exec 'npm run build:simple && npm run fix-icons'

author: Sudhanshu Patel
